pullRequest.body:
Adds simp lemma for `(p * q) %â‚˜ q = 0` and `(q * p) %â‚˜ q = 0`.

Also corrects a misspelling: `dvd_iff_modByMonic_eq_zero` should be `modByMonic_eq_zero_iff_dvd`

---

I was confused why this was so far from the other one, but it looks like it needs commutativity. Would it be helpful to add documentation comments to these two lemmas pointing at each other?

```suggestion
lemma self_mul_modByMonic (hq : q.Monic) : (q * p) %â‚˜ q = 0 := by
```

```suggestion
lemma mul_self_modByMonic (hq : q.Monic) : (p * q) %â‚˜ q = 0 := by
```
